Name: Lord Marksman and Vanadis
Tags: Action, Adventure, Ecchi, Fantasy, Harem, Romance, Political, Swordplay, War, Based on a Light Novel, Violence
Description: "Tigrevurmud Vorn, the young lord of a remote region far from the kingdom's center, is commanded by the king to go fight the war against a neighboring country. The leader of the enemy is Eleonora Viltaria, one of the seven Vanadis given supernatural arms from a dragon. The moment when an archer boy and the silver-haired beautiful war maiden meet, it is the beginning for the legend of a hero that will be told for generations to come."
Related_Mange: Lord Marksman and Vanadis, Lord Marksman and Vanadis (Light Novel)
Related_anime: Lord Marksman and Vanadis: Tigre and Vanadish

Name: Legends of the Dark King: A Fist of the North Star Story
Japanese_name: Hokuto no Ken: Raoh Gaiden - Ten no Haoh
Tags: Action, Seinen, Martial Arts, Overpowered Main Characters, Post-apocalyptic, Based on a Manga, Explicit Violence
Description: "The year is 199X, and most of the world's population has been wiped out by nuclear war. Raoh, the strongest warrior alive, survives by using a deadly martial art known as Hokuto Shin Ken; this powerful fighting style targets pressure points and is said to be unbeatable. Along with the feisty and beautiful Reina, her smart and cunning brother Souga and Raoh's trusty steed Kokuro-ko, Raoh sets forth to conquer what's left of mankind. Yet the world is not as we know it – it's filled with killers, thieves, warlords and the weak. With epic power and fear, Raoh will conquer his enemies where they stand."
Related_Mange: Fist of the North Star, Fist of the Blue Sky, Legends of the Dark Kings: A Fist of the North Star Story, Fist of the North Star Gaiden: Kinyoku no Garuda - Nanto Goshasei Zenshi, Fist of the Blue Sky: Regenesis
